# Test Email Workflow

You are testing email automation workflows.

## TASK

Create and run tests for email workflows and automations.

## STEPS

1) Understand the workflow:
   - Read workflow definition
   - Check `server/pipeline-workflows.ts`
   - Understand triggers and actions
   - Review email templates

2) Create test scenarios:
   - Happy path scenarios
   - Error scenarios
   - Edge cases
   - Different email types

3) Set up test environment:
   - Use test Gmail account
   - Mock external services if needed
   - Prepare test data
   - Set up test fixtures

4) Write tests:
   - Unit tests for workflow logic
   - Integration tests for full flow
   - Test email parsing
   - Test template rendering

5) Run tests:
   - Execute test suite
   - Verify all scenarios pass
   - Check error handling
   - Fix any failures

## OUTPUT

Provide:
- Test scenarios defined
- Test files created
- Test results
- Issues found and fixed
- Coverage report
